greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of positive root of x^4 - x^3 - 1 = 0.
comment: Also the growth constant of the Fibonacci 3-numbers A003269 [Stakhov et al.]. - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 05 2008
link: Iain Fox, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
Simon Baker, Exceptional digit frequencies and expansions in non-integer bases, arXiv:1711.10397 [math.DS], 2017. See the beta(3) constant pp. 3-4.
A. Stakhov, B. Rozin, Theory of Binet formulas for Fibonacci and Lucas p-numbers, Chaos, Solit. Fractals 27 (2006), 1162-1177.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pisot-Vijayaraghavan Constant
program: (PARI) polrootsreal( x^4-x^3-1)[2] \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 14 2014
(PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=solve(x=1, 2, x^4 - x^3 - 1); for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b086106.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Iain Fox_, Oct 23 2017
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jul 09 2003
